select spu.id, spu.product_name as productName, spu.product_price as productPrice ,spu.product_market_price as productMarketPrice, spu.product_cost_price as productCostPrice, spu.product_status as productStatus, spu.product_stock as productStock, spu.create_time as createTime, spu.last_update_time as lastUpdateTime , brand.brand_name as brandName,type.type_name as typeName ,category.category_name as categoryName from sport_m_product_spu spu inner join sport_m_brand brand on (spu.brand_id = brand.id) inner join sport_m_type type on (spu.type_id = type.id) inner join sport_m_category category on (spu.category_id = category.id) where spu.stat = '1' and type.stat = '1' and brand.stat = '1' and category.stat = '1'
and spu.product_name like "%"#{spu.productName}"%"
and brand.brand_name like "%"#{spu.brandName}"%"
and type.type_name like "%"#{spu.typeName}"%"
and category_name like "%"#{spu.categoryName}"%"
and product_status = #{spu.productStatus}
limit #{page.startNum}, #{page.pageSize}

select count(*) from sport_m_product_spu spu inner join sport_m_brand brand on (spu.brand_id = brand.id) inner join sport_m_type type on (spu.type_id = type.id) inner join sport_m_category category on (spu.category_id = category.id) where spu.stat = '1' and type.stat = '1' and brand.stat = '1' and category.stat = '1'
